item.title: Ticket #388 (Saving an entry in Firefox takes a long time (minutes) to get to the ...) updated
item.dc:creator: anonymousbugger
item.description:
If this is WP 1.3, this was probably caused by checking the post for enclosures. I have just submitted a patch to speed this up significantly. In wp-includes/functions.php change line 819 from:

while ( !feof($fp) )

TO

while ( !feof($fp) && strpos( $response, "\r\n\r\n" ) == false )

This will make it close the connection when it sees a blank line from the remote server.

item.title: Changeset [1820]: Make checking enclosure URLs much faster - fclose() after blank line ...
item.dc:creator: donncha
item.description: Make checking enclosure URLs much faster - fclose() after blank line in response.

item.title: Ticket #389 (REQUEST_URI is set but null on IIS affecting PATH_INFO permalinks) created
item.dc:creator: dennis
item.description: The existing code in wp-settings.php that corrects for IIS not setting REQUEST_URI does not account for the case where it is set but null. This appears in 1.2 and CVS. See the attached diff for a proposed fix.

item.title: Ticket #388 (Saving an entry in Firefox takes a long time (minutes) to get to the ...) created
item.dc:creator: htodd
item.description: Save an entry in Firefox and the little spinner will keep going. The entry appears saved soon, but it takes forever for the next page to be reached.
